question: What is the name of the fund set up by Government of India to complete stalled housing projects?
explanation:
Special Window for Completion of Construction of Affordable and Mid-Income Housing Projectsâ€™ (SWAMIH) fund was set up by the Government of India with a corpus of Rs.250 billion. The fund was established to complete stalled housing projects in India.
SBICAP Ventures Ltd is the fund manager. This fund is set to deliver its 1st finished apartment soon. It is proposed to handover 16 projects in the current financial year.
